channel.title: Alot of silab items (bandos arrmydal armour ect) goes to attack
channel.description:
Yeah.. alot of the items dont work (skill capes do and the swords do.. except sara ) but the armour.
It goes to attack and says non existing item.
Please help :P

item.title: Alot of silab items (bandos arrmydal armour ect) goes to attack
item.dc:creator: @Morgarath Morgarath
item.description:
@Morgarath wrote:

tnx
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2008, 03:36:16 PM[/size][hr]I’m kinda confused now.

It has 2 handed weapons, but not one handed weapons.

the in says

 //all other ids are weapons

so I tried searching for an iron scimitar… and it didnt find it.

So im kinda lost :o

item.title: Alot of silab items (bandos arrmydal armour ect) goes to attack
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Go into item.java, and find the Item slot, such as:

public static int amulets[]

Then add the ID of the item in the slot which you want it to go in, such as Legs, Ring, etc.

Read full topic
